features: Who Benefits from Monk Mode?This template is for Monk Mode beginners and those refining their cycles. Your success largely depends on your ability to plan and organize effectively.; What Is Notion?Notion is a free digital workspace. You can think, write, and plan with great flexibility. It's the perfect platform for organizing your Monk Mode practice.; Do I Need a Paid Notion Plan?No, all the features work perfectly fine without a paid Notion plan.; What Happens After Purchase?Once you make your purchase, you'll be directed to a Notion page containing the template. You can easily duplicate it into your own workspace from there.; Can I Customize the Template?Absolutely, these templates are designed to be personalized. Feel free to edit and tailor it to your liking.
